Inspirational.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing you best today
Inspirational.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

Inspirational.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
Inspirational.author: Helen Keller

Inspirational.quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
Inspirational.author: Francis of Assisi

Inspirational.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
Inspirational.author: Jimmy Dean

Inspirational.quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
Inspirational.author: Maya Angelou

Inspirational.quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
Inspirational.author: William Shakespeare

Inspirational.quote: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
Inspirational.author: Joseph Campbell

Inspirational.quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up & speak.  Courage is also what it takes to sit down & listen.
Inspirational.author: Sir Winston Churchill

Inspirational.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
Inspirational.author: Walt Disney

Success.quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
Success.author: James Cameron

Success.quote: Entrepreneurs average 3.8 failures before final success. What sets the successful ones apart is their amazing persistence.
Success.author: Lisa M. Amos

Success.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
Success.author: Jim Rohn

Success.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Success.author: Henry David Thoreau

Success.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
Success.author: John Wooden

Success.quote: Stop chasing the money and start chasing the passion.
Success.author: Tony Hsieh

Success.quote: If you are willing to do more than you are paid to do, eventually you will be paid to do more than you do.
Success.author: Anonymous

Success.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle
Success.author: Steve Jobs

Success.quote: Whenever you see a successful person, you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.
Success.author: Vaibhav Shah

Life.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Life.author: Confucius

Life.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
Life.author: Buddha

Life.quote: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
Life.author: Lou Holtz

Life.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.
Life.author: Audrey Hepburn

Life.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
Life.author: George Bernard Shaw

Life.quote: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
Life.author: Cesare Pavese

Life.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
Life.author: Marcus Aurelius

Life.quote: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.
Life.author: Sholom Aleichem

Life.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
Life.author: Abraham Lincoln

Life.quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love.
Life.author: Rumi

Funny.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
Funny.author: Elbert Hubbard

Funny.quote: We are all here on earth to help others; what on earth the others are here for I don't know.
Funny.author: W. H. Auden

Funny.quote: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
Funny.author: Isaac Asimov

Funny.quote: A woman's mind is cleaner than a man's: She changes it more often.
Funny.author: Oliver Herford

Funny.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
Funny.author: Margaret Mead

Funny.quote: I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade... And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.
Funny.author: Ron White

Funny.quote: If you haven't got anything nice to say about anybody, come sit next to me.
Funny.author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

Funny.quote: Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.
Funny.author: Mark Twain

Funny.quote: I'm sorry, if you were right, I'd agree with you.
Funny.author: Robin Williams

Funny.quote: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
Funny.author: Lana Turner
